name: The gloves of the Magi
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users wisdom noticably.
It increases the users intelligence noticably.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'damage analysis'.
